name: Kono Oozora ni, Tsubasa o Hirogete: Cruise Sign
name_original: Kono Oozora ni, Tsubasa o Hirogete: Cruise Sign
description:
Kono Oozora ni, Tsubasa o Hirogete: Cruise Sign is an adventure game developed by 5pb. It was originally released in 2014. 5pb published the game.
Kono Oozora ni, Tsubasa o Hirogete: Cruise Sign is available on PlayStation 3 and PS Vita.
